mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member2(id, pw, name, age, email, phone, zipcode, road_addr, jibun_addr, detail_addr) VALUES( #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{age}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{zipcode}, #{road_addr}, #{jibun_addr}, #{detail_addr} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, pw, name FROM member2 WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT IFNULL(id, 0) FROM member2 WHERE name= #{name} AND phone = #{phone}

UPDATE member2 SET pw=#{pw} WHERE id=#{id}
